title: the Tidesong Enchanter
intro: Phraya is the serene but fierce enchanter of the Sunken Bastion. While her husband, Nakaraj, represents the crushing weight of the depths, Phraya represents the life-giving and relentless nature of the currents. Dressed in flowing silks and jade jewelry that chimes like crashing waves, she orchestrates the battlefield to ensure her people and her Paragon never falter.

abilities.name: Gift of the Sea
abilities.details:
Phraya's damaging abilities apply a stack of Brine to enemies. Once the first stack is applied, allied heroes' basic attacks also apply a stack of Brine (1 stack per unique ability).

Upon reaching 4 stacks, the Brine detonates, dealing magical damage (scaling with magical power) and healing the last allied hero who damaged that enemy (or Phraya herself).

abilities.name: Cresting Tide
abilities.details: Nara sends a small, focused wave in a target direction, dealing magical damage (scaling with magical power) to all enemies it passes through and slowing them for a short duration.

abilities.name: Pearl Blessing
abilities.details:
Phraya blesses a targeted ally with a shimmering water bubble, granting the ally a shield (scaling with magical power) and bonus movement speed.

If the shield is broken by an enemy, Cresting Tide's cooldown is reduced by half.

abilities.name: Spiraling Shoal
abilities.details:
Phraya commands a spectral fish to swim in a circle around a target location for a few seconds, dealing magical damage (scaling with magical power) to any enemy and healing (scaling with magical power) any ally it passes through.

While within the Deepwater Domain, the fish grows larger, dealing increased damage and knocking up enemies hit by its initial pass.

abilities.name: Deepwater Domain
abilities.details:
Phraya chants an ancient hymn, transforming the surrounding area into a Deepwater Domain for a duration. During this time, allied heroes within the domain are healed (scaling with magical power) every second and ignore unit collision.

Phraya cannot move and use any abilities while chanting the hymn. In addition, her Spiraling Shoal is enhanced while the domain is active.
